title: "Data Import"
output: github_document

```{r set up}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(haven)
```

## Read in some data

Read in the litters dataset.

```{r}
#absolute direction path is not recommended
#use relative path:
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv")
#use the clean_names function in janitor package to clean column names
litters_df = janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```


## Take a look at the data

```{r}
litters_df
head(litters_df)
tail(litters_df)
```

## Options to read csv

```{r}
#skip 10 rows
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv",skip=10)
#identify NAs
litters_df = read_csv("./data/FAS_litters.csv", na = c("", "NA","?", 999))
```

## Other file formats

Read in excel file

```{r}
mlb_df = read_excel("./data/mlb11.xlsx")
```

Read in a SAS file

```{r}
pulse_df = read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat")
```
